title: Deep In The Basement | Best of RGSO
description:
A woman fears visiting the basement laundry room in her home because she knows something, or someone resides in the dark down there.
Here is a preview.
“So, the experience that frightens me the most is not actually a ghost, but probably demon related. But, while in my late 20s, I lived alone in a small apartment. I joke to people that I was a big X-files fan, and I always seemed to do my washes on the night of the show. The apartment complex had a laundry room behind the apartment building in the basement. It was small, so I would have to do my wash during the week to get a free washer.”
